mapper.select: select IFNULL(rpr.type,'') as type, IFNULL(rpr.create_date,'') as createDate, IFNULL(dm.`name`,'') as name , IFNULL(dm.worker_type,'') as workerType, IFNULL(dm.mobile,'') as mobile, IFNULL(CONCAT(IFNULL(dh.residential,'*'),IFNULL(CONCAT(dh.building,'栋'),'*栋'),IFNULL(CONCAT(dh.unit,'单元'),'*单元'),IFNULL(CONCAT(dh.number,'号'),'*号')) ,'') as address, IFNULL(rpc.name,'') as rpcName, IFNULL(rpc.content,'') as content, '' as images from dj_worker_reward_punish_record rpr inner join dj_member dm on rpr.member_id=dm.id inner join dj_house dh on rpr.house_id=dh.id inner join dj_worker_reward_punish_correlation rpc on rpr.reward_punish_correlation_id=rpc.id where rpr.id=#{id}

SELECT r.id, r.reward_punish_correlation_id, r.member_id, r.operator_id, r.house_id, r.type, r.state, r.remarks, r.create_date, r.modify_date, r.data_status, CONCAT( h.residential, IFNULL(h.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit, '单元'),'' ), IFNULL(h.number, '*'), '号' ) house_name, u.nick_name memberName, t.id tid, t.`name` tname, t.content tcontent, t.type ttype, t.state tstate, m.`id` mid, m.`reward_punish_correlation_id` mreward_punish_correlation_id, m.`name` mname, m.type mtype, m.quantity mquantity, m.units munits, m.start_time mstart_time, m.end_time mend_time FROM `dj_worker_reward_punish_record` r LEFT JOIN dj_house h ON r.house_id = h.id INNER JOIN dj_member u ON r.member_id = u.id INNER JOIN dj_worker_reward_punish_correlation t ON r.reward_punish_correlation_id = t.id INNER JOIN dj_worker_reward_punish_condition m ON r.reward_punish_correlation_id = m.reward_punish_correlation_id where r.data_status=0
and r.id = #{rewardPunishRecordId}

select count(1)as num , '全部' as name , 1 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on dbs.house_id=dh.id and dbs.member_id=#{memberId} union all select count(1)as num , '在施工地' as name , 2 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on dbs.house_id=dh.id and dbs.member_id=#{memberId} and dh.visit_state=1 union all select count(1)as num , '本周新开' as name, 3 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on dbs.house_id=dh.id and dbs.member_id=#{memberId} and YEARWEEK(date_format(dh.construction_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and dh.visit_state=1 union all select count(1)as num , '本月竣工' as name , 4 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on dbs.house_id=dh.id and dbs.member_id=#{memberId} and dh.visit_state=3 union all select count(1)as num , '今日开工' as name , 5 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on dbs.house_id=dh.id and dbs.member_id=#{memberId} and to_days(dh.construction_date) = to_days(now()) and dh.visit_state=1 union all select count(1)as num , '连续三天未开工' as name , 6 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) <= date(dh.construction_date) and dbs.member_id=#{memberId}and dh.visit_state=0 union all select count(1)as num , '超期施工' as name, 7 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_basics_supervisor_authority dbs on dh.id=dbs.house_id and dbs.member_id=#{memberId} union all select count(1)as num , '维保工地' as name , 8 as sortNum from dj_house dh inner join dj_maintenance_record dmr on dmr.house_id=dh.id
